Package com.example.group1hrmsapp.service

Interface TimeOffRequestService

All Known Implementing Classes:
TimeOffRequestServiceImpl
public interface TimeOffRequestService
The TimeOffRequestService interface defines the standard operations to be performed on a TimeOffRequest.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    TimeOffRequest approveTimeOffRequest​(java.lang.Long requestId, java.lang.Long managerId)
    Approves a time off request.
    TimeOffRequest cancelTimeOffRequest​(java.lang.Long requestId)
    Cancels a time off request.
    void createTimeOffRequest​(TimeOffRequest request)
    Creates a new time off request.
    org.springframework.data.domain.Page<TimeOffRequest> findFilteredAndPaginated​(org.springframework.data.jpa.domain.Specification<TimeOffRequest> spec, org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
    Returns a paginated and filtered list of TimeOffRequest objects.
    org.springframework.data.domain.Page<TimeOffRequest> findPaginated​(int pageNo, int pageSize, java.lang.String sortField, java.lang.String sortDirection)
    Returns a paginated list of TimeOffRequest objects.
    java.util.List<TimeOffRequest> getAllTimeOffRequests()
    Returns all time off requests in the system.
    org.springframework.data.jpa.domain.Specification<TimeOffRequest> prepareSpecification​(java.lang.String startDate, java.lang.String endDate, java.lang.String timeOffType, java.lang.String timeOffStatus)
    Prepares a Specification object based on provided filter criteria.
    TimeOffRequest rejectTimeOffRequest​(java.lang.Long requestId, java.lang.Long managerId)
    Rejects a time off request.

  • Method Details

    • getAllTimeOffRequests

      java.util.List<TimeOffRequest> getAllTimeOffRequests()
      Returns all time off requests in the system.
      Returns:
      a list of TimeOffRequest objects.

    • createTimeOffRequest

      void createTimeOffRequest​(TimeOffRequest request)
      Creates a new time off request.
      Parameters:
      request - the TimeOffRequest object to be saved.

    • cancelTimeOffRequest

      TimeOffRequest cancelTimeOffRequest​(java.lang.Long requestId)
      Cancels a time off request.
      Parameters:
      requestId - the id of the TimeOffRequest to be cancelled.
      Returns:
      the cancelled TimeOffRequest object.

    • approveTimeOffRequest

      TimeOffRequest approveTimeOffRequest​(java.lang.Long requestId, java.lang.Long managerId)
      Approves a time off request.
      Parameters:
      requestId - the id of the TimeOffRequest to be approved.
      managerId - the id of the manager who approves the request.
      Returns:
      the approved TimeOffRequest object.

    • rejectTimeOffRequest

      TimeOffRequest rejectTimeOffRequest​(java.lang.Long requestId, java.lang.Long managerId)
      Rejects a time off request.
      Parameters:
      requestId - the id of the TimeOffRequest to be rejected.
      managerId - the id of the manager who rejects the request.
      Returns:
      the rejected TimeOffRequest object.

    • findPaginated

      org.springframework.data.domain.Page<TimeOffRequest> findPaginated​(int pageNo, int pageSize, java.lang.String sortField, java.lang.String sortDirection)
      Returns a paginated list of TimeOffRequest objects.
      Parameters:
      pageNo - the page number.
      pageSize - the size of the page.
      sortField - the field by which to sort the TimeOffRequest objects.
      sortDirection - the direction of the sort (asc or desc).
      Returns:
      a Page of TimeOffRequest objects.

    • findFilteredAndPaginated

      org.springframework.data.domain.Page<TimeOffRequest> findFilteredAndPaginated​(org.springframework.data.jpa.domain.Specification<TimeOffRequest> spec, org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
      Returns a paginated and filtered list of TimeOffRequest objects.
      Parameters:
      spec - the specification defining the filtering criteria.
      pageable - the paging parameters.
      Returns:
      a Page of TimeOffRequest objects that match the specification.

    • prepareSpecification

      org.springframework.data.jpa.domain.Specification<TimeOffRequest> prepareSpecification​(java.lang.String startDate, java.lang.String endDate, java.lang.String timeOffType, java.lang.String timeOffStatus)
      Prepares a Specification object based on provided filter criteria.
      Parameters:
      startDate - the start date for the time off.
      endDate - the end date for the time off.
      timeOffType - the type of the time off.
      timeOffStatus - the status of the time off.
      Returns:
      a Specification object.
